nodes.text: CZ-2X Infiltrator Droids were battle droids created by Czerka Arms during the era of the Galactic War. Smaller than their sister-models, the Infiltrator droids were utilized to augment the capabiliites of CZ-8X, an Eradicator droid guarding the Atrium during the conflict brought on by seizure of Czerka's assets by the Republic Adjucators and resurgent Sith Empire.
